mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO TB_FISHING ( FISHING_NO, FISHING_WRITER, FISHING_NAME , ADDRESS, PHONE, START_TIME, END_TIME, INTRODUCE, STATUS, FISHING_FILE_URL ) VALUES ( SEQ_FHNO.NEXTVAL, #{fishingWriter}, #{fishingName}, #{address}, #{phone}, #{startTime}, #{endTime}, #{introduce}, 'Y', #{fishingFileUrl} )
SELECT SEQ_FHNO.CURRVAL FROM DUAL

INSERT INTO TB_REGISTERED_FISH ( FISHING_NO, FISH_NO )
SELECT #{fish.fishingNo}, #{fish.fishNo} FROM DUAL

INSERT INTO TB_REGISTERED_AMENITIES ( FISHING_NO, AMENITIES_NO )
SELECT #{amenities.fishingNo}, #{amenities.amenitiesNo} FROM DUAL
mapper.select: SELECT F.FISHING_NO fishingNo, M.NICKNAME fishingWriter, F.FISHING_NAME fishingName, F.PHONE phone, F.ADDRESS address, F.START_TIME startTime, F.END_TIME endTime, F.INTRODUCE introduce, F.LATITUDE lat, F.LONGITUDE lng, F.STATUS status FROM TB_FISHING F JOIN TB_MEMBER M ON (F.FISHING_WRITER = M.USER_NO) WHERE F.STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY F.FISHING_NO DESC

SELECT rf.FISHING_NO fishingNo, tfwf.FISH_NAME fishName, tfwf.FISH_NO fishNo FROM TB_REGISTERED_FISH rf JOIN TB_FRESH_WATHER_FISH tfwf ON rf.FISH_NO = tfwf.FISH_NO WHERE rf.FISHING_NO IN
#{fishingNo}

SELECT tra.FISHING_NO fishingNo, ta.AMENITIES_NO amenitiesNo, ta.AMENITIES_NAME amenitiesName FROM TB_REGISTERED_AMENITIES tra JOIN TB_AMENITIES ta ON TA.AMENITIES_NO = tra.AMENITIES_NO WHERE tra.FISHING_NO IN #{fishingNo}

SELECT F.FISHING_NO fishingNo, M.NICKNAME fishingWriter, F.FISHING_NAME fishingName, F.PHONE phone, F.ADDRESS address, F.START_TIME startTime, F.END_TIME endTime, F.INTRODUCE introduce, F.LATITUDE lat, F.LONGITUDE lng, F.STATUS status, F.FISHING_FILE_URL fishingFileUrl FROM TB_FISHING F JOIN TB_MEMBER M ON (F.FISHING_WRITER = M.USER_NO) WHERE F.STATUS = 'Y'
AND FISHING_NO = #{fishingNo}
SELECT rf.FISHING_NO fishingNo, tfwf.FISH_NAME fishName, tfwf.FISH_NO fishNo FROM TB_REGISTERED_FISH rf JOIN TB_FRESH_WATHER_FISH tfwf ON rf.FISH_NO = tfwf.FISH_NO WHERE rf.FISHING_NO = #{fishingNo}

SELECT tra.FISHING_NO fishingNo, ta.AMENITIES_NO amenitiesNo, ta.AMENITIES_NAME amenitiesName FROM TB_REGISTERED_AMENITIES tra JOIN TB_AMENITIES ta ON ta.AMENITIES_NO = tra.AMENITIES_NO WHERE tra.FISHING_NO = #{fishingNo}
